languages.text:
Дает хелбруту 100% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}брони{/g} и 40 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражения{/g}. Атакующие его в {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}ближнем бою{/g} выполняют {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} и в случае провала получают эффект {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}горения{/g} на 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g}.
Атаки Ульфара могут игнорировать эти эффекты.
languages.original_text:
Grants the Helbrute 100% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and 40 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Melee attackers{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or start {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
Ulfar's attacks can negate these effects.

traits.locale_text:
Grants the Helbrute 100% armour and 40 deflection. Melee attackers must pass a Willpower resistance test or start burning for 2 rounds.
Ulfar's attacks can negate these effects.

Grants the Helbrute 100% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and 40 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Melee attackers{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or start {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
Ulfar's attacks can negate these effects.

languages.text:
地狱兽{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}提高100%，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}提高40点。进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近战攻击{/g}时，攻击者必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，否则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
乌尔法的攻击可以抵消这些效果。
languages.original_text:
Grants the Helbrute 100% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and 40 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Melee attackers{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or start {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
Ulfar's attacks can negate these effects.

traits.locale_text:
地狱兽{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}护甲{/g}提高100%，{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}提高40点。进行{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近战攻击{/g}时，攻击者必须通过{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}抗性{g|Encyclopedia:Test}检定{/g}，否则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃烧{/g}状态，持续两{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。
乌尔法的攻击可以抵消这些效果。

languages.text:
ヘルブルートに{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}100％と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}40を与える。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}近接攻撃{/g}は2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を成功させるか{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}を始めなければならない。
ウルファーの攻撃はこれらの効果を無効化する。
languages.original_text:
Grants the Helbrute 100% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and 40 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Melee attackers{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or start {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
Ulfar's attacks can negate these effects.

traits.locale_text:
ヘルブルートに{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}アーマー{/g}100％と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}40を与える。{g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}近接攻撃{/g}は2{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}を成功させるか{g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}燃焼{/g}を始めなければならない。
ウルファーの攻撃はこれらの効果を無効化する。

languages.text:
Otorga al Bruto Infernal 100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y 40 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}. Los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}atacantes cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de resistencia de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
Los ataques de Ulfar pueden negar estos efectos.
languages.original_text:
Grants the Helbrute 100% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and 40 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Melee attackers{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or start {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Otorga al Bruto Infernal 100 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armadura{/g} y 40 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g}. Los {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}atacantes cuerpo a cuerpo{/g} deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:Test}prueba{/g} de resistencia de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} o sufrir {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}quemadura{/g} durante 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asaltos{/g}.
Los ataques de Ulfar pueden negar estos efectos.

languages.text:
Gewährt dem Höllenschlächter 100 % {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und 40 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Nahkampfangreifer{/g} müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen, oder sie {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennen{/g} für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}.
Ulfars Angriffe können diese Effekte negieren.
languages.original_text:
Grants the Helbrute 100% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and 40 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Melee attackers{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or start {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Gewährt dem Höllenschlächter 100% {g|Encyclopedia:Armour}Rüstung{/g} und 40 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Deflektion{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}Nahkampfangreifer{/g} müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} bestehen, oder sie {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}brennen{/g} für 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runden{/g}.
Ulfars Angriffe können diese Effekte negieren.

languages.text:
Confère au Métabrutus 100 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} et 40 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}. Les personnages qui lancent une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}attaque de mêlée{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force Mentale{/g}, faute de quoi ils subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
Les attaques d'Ulfar peuvent annuler ces effets.
languages.original_text:
Grants the Helbrute 100% {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and 40 {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacksGlossary}Melee attackers{/g} must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} or start {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}burning{/g} for 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
Ulfar's attacks can negate these effects.

traits.locale_text:
Confère au Métabrutus 100 % d'{g|Encyclopedia:Armour}armure{/g} et 40 de {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}déflexion{/g}. Les personnages qui lancent une {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttacks}attaque de mêlée{/g} doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:Test}test{/g} de résistance lié à la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Volonté{/g}, faute de quoi ils subissent l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:BurningEffect}Combustion{/g} pendant 2 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}rounds{/g}.
Les attaques d'Ulfar peuvent annuler ces effets.
